reviews.text: Terry and his crew came out to fix our roof which had to be repaired due to foundation repairs.  I wish I could give them better than five stars.  Terry was honest, and personable and made the whole process pleasing.  It was like sitting down to talk to an old friend! I called on Thursday evening and they were here on Saturday morning to fix the repairs before the freezing weather hit.  I cannot recommend this company enough!  Call them for all your roofing needs!

Roofing Solutions of Texas responded promptly to my inquiry and was able to set an inspection appointment time that worked with my schedule. They kept me apprised of their schedule and arrived timely. Terry listened to the concerns that I had about my roof and then thoroughly evaluated the situation. He took pictures of the roof damage and was able to show me and explain why I was having a problem and what he would do to fix it.
The repair work itself was scheduled and completed for the estimate

I am so grateful to have someone I can depend on for small roof repairs without heavy pressure for full replacement of my middle-aged roof. Of course, it follows that I will trust Roofing Solutions of Texas for replacement when that time comes.

They do a great job of the roof, always explain what is being done and why, and will come back to make corrections and adjustments in the rare instance when the invoice is not matched by the work (ie type/size of new roof vent). I plan on staying with this company for many more years, and I cannot say that about most companies.

Roofing Solutions of Texas is awesome!  Terry explained everything in detail and they completed my roof in one day.  They also cleaned up afterwards with no sign they were ever there, EXCEPT FOR MY BRAND NEW ROOF!  Reliable, trustworthy, courteous, what more can you ask for!

After the recent storms, we learned how to avoid roofing scams: ask for the checklist called "8 Questions homeowners must know when hiring a roofer."

Knowing how to interview and hire a roofer gave us the confidence that these guys would do everything that they promised us – no shortcuts, no shoddy workmanship.

Now our new roof looks terrific, and we feel great knowing that we got more guarantees with Roofing Solutions of Texas.

A few months ago I had a leak in my roof.   Bill came out write away and gave me an estimate and then returned a day or two later to fix.  He did a great job.  Now I am using him again to put gutters all around my house.  Gave me a good estimate and worked like a professional.  I appreciate how he was on time and will use them again when it is time for a new roof!

We called them for a quote to repair 2 roof leaks. Other companies were only interested in doing full roof replacements, not doing any sort of repair work. Roofing Solutions came out and gave us a fair price to do the repair as well as improving the underlayment that should help prevent the issue in the future.

I would highly recommend them to anyone in need of roof repair or replacement.

Joe and his crew (Victor) were quick to respond to my request… and did more than they promised.   They performed a roof tune up and replaced 6 boot jacks that had failed over the years.  Price was fair and absloutely high value for dollar.  They also patched an area in my siding that had a small critter hole with flash and caulked another part on my chimney.  Have Joe in my contacts now and will definitely use them again.

Roofing Solutions of Texas exceeded all of our expectations. Bill Brooks is very knowledgeable and professional.  He answered all of our lengthy questions and returned every phone call personally.  I highly recommend Roofing Solutions, a company that does business with honesty and integrity.
